pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.Parent

Class KidViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.iade.ManageeMHome.controllers.Parent.KidViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITab

    public class KidViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITab
    This class is the controller for the "kid tab" that has:

    a table view kidTV, that displays the kids that the logged parent, returned by the method:

    PersonDAO.getLoggedParent()

    a "plus button" that opens the "add kid window", managed by:

    AddKidController

    a "notifications button" that opens the "notifications window" managed by:

    NotificationsController

    buttons to the other tabs: parents, tasks and rewards:

    ParentViewController

    TaskViewController

    RewardViewController

    The "kid tab" is in this fxml file: pt.iade.ManageeMHome.views#kidView.fxml.

    Author:
    jaime
